title: We Have Experienced Professionals & We Do Our Best To Achieve Your Goal. Your Happiness Is Our First Priority.
desc1: From its humble beginnings in 2020, Carhood Auto Garage has grown up to be one of the most reputable Motor Vehicle Workshops in Juja, Nairobi with proven track record in Motor vehicle and Machinery repairs.
desc2: Our philosophy is simple, regardless of what the job may be – whether it is Vehicle major service/ repairs, Normal service, panel beating or Spray painting – we continuously strive to provide our clients with top class services.
